title: Baked salmon fishcakes with parsley sauce
ingredients: ['750 g (1 lb 10 oz) potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks', '350 g (12 oz) salmon fillets', '300 ml (10 fl oz) skimmed milk', '2 tablespoons tomato ketchup', '1 tablespoon anchovy essence, optional', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh chives or parsley', 'Salt and black pepper', '1 egg', '90 g (3Â¼ oz) dried breadcrumbs', 'For the sauce', '25 g (1 oz) plain white flour', '25 g (1 oz) 70 per cent fat spread', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley']
